categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Starcrossed was a SoroSuub Luxury Cruiser 200 operated by Captain Heedon during the Galactic Civil War. It was refurbished by Heedon to resemble a bird, but much of the interior was left undone due to the fact that, due to Imperial oppression, not many could afford passage onboard the ship.
The Starcrossed was involved in Sayer Mon Neela's bold attack on the Imperial Victory-class Star Destroyer Imperial Hazard during the Evacuation of Horob.
